__e: It ain't Michigan and you're not 7... but it is pretty cool, ain't it, Nate?
I guess, it was because I was in Michigan at the time, and... It was about 8 years ago that I was old enough to get one. People were still a little freaked out by it then.
I asked you a question, now my poor widow wife is getting ready to fly back to Michigan and she's waiting for you to tell her whether she's gonna be alright.
